name: 王紳
objective:
1. 微波理論教學與高頻電路模擬軟體
2. 微波濾波電路設計與實作
3. 微波耦合器電路設計與實作
schedule:
Week   Topic                                          
1      Introduction & Lab. 0 Tutorial
2-4    Design & Implementation of Microstrip line
5      Lab. 1 & 2 Tutorial                            
6-8    Design & Implementation of LPF
9-11   Design & Implementation of BPF                 
12     Lab. 3 & 4 Tutorial
13-15  Design & Implementation of WPD
15-17  Design & Implementation of Rat-race
18     Final Exam
